Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

summary.span: 將介面標記為本機服務介面。

span.span: Marks an interface as a local service interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!WARNING] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 實作本機服務介面的類別必須加入至 ，且可由 和 使用。A class that implements a local service interface must be added to the and can be used by and . 在以 屬性化之介面上的事件，應有衍生自 的事件資料。Events on interfaces that are attributed with should have event data that derive from . 在支援介面方法和事件宣告的泛型型別時，不支援介面宣告本身的泛型型別。While generic types are supported for interface method and event declarations, generic types are not supported for the interface declaration itself. 下面介面不可做為 `ExternalDataExchange` 的有效介面。The following interface would not be valid for use as an `ExternalDataExchange`. ``` public interface IInterfaceName { void MethodName(TCommand Request); } ``` ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範如何在介面上設定 。The following code example shows how to set the on an interface. 這個程式碼範例是 IStartPurchaseOrder.cs 檔案中＜ActiveDirectory 角色 SDK＞範例的一部分。This code example is part of the ActiveDirectoryRoles SDK sample from the IStartPurchaseOrder.cs file. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[使用 Active Directory 角色](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7b1708da-fd2a-47da-902b-3d50580ee781)。For more information, see [Using Active Directory Roles](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7b1708da-fd2a-47da-902b-3d50580ee781). [!code-csharp[wf_samples#285](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/cs/snippets24.cs#285)]
